definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region, abbr. 新, capital Urumqi or Ürümqi 烏魯木齊|乌鲁木齐
pinyin: Xin1 jiang1 Wei2 wu2 er3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1
Shi4 jie4 Wei2 wu2 er3 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

sentences.english: We ask the young Uighur restaurant worker how it should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我們問餐廳年輕的維吾爾員工這樣冤冤相報何時能了。

sentences.english: Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀華新疆維吾爾自治區公安廳廳長職務。

sentences.english: Uighurs with disciplinary problems or criminal offenses are treated leniently , they say.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，政府對違法犯罪的維吾爾族人進行寬大處理。

sentences.english: All four cases are from Hotan Prefecture, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China.
sentences.chinese: 所有四個病例都來自中國新疆維吾爾自治區和田地區。

sentences.english: But even they weren't able to stop vigilante group of Han Chinese attacking Uigur men.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他們也不能阻止漢族義警組織襲擊維吾爾族人。

sentences.english: All Uyghurs were ordered off the street, he said.
sentences.chinese: 所有的維吾爾人都被命令離開街道，他說。

sentences.english: Uighur words and phrases also have motivated.
sentences.chinese: 維吾爾語詞也具有理據性。

sentences.english: With regard to the ethnic Uighur sources, different opinions.
sentences.chinese: 關於維吾爾族的族源，說法不一。

sentences.english: For this problem, the noisy channel based Uyghur neutralized vowel identification model is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出基於噪聲信道的維吾爾語央音原音識別模型。

sentences.english: Wan Haichuan was appointed Member of Party Leadership Group of the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 任命彎海川爲新疆維吾爾自治區人民政府黨組成員。

sentences.english: Chapter 6 is a semantic category Uighur Proverbs.
sentences.chinese: 第6章是維吾爾諺語語義的類聚。

sentences.english: The dough-twist style plaits are a symbol of Uygur girls.
sentences.chinese: 麻花辮子幾乎是維吾爾族姑娘的象徵了。

sentences.english: In the conclusion the author represents Tohty Baki's all contribution to Uyghur Current Literature.
sentences.chinese: 在結論中總結了託乎提巴克對維吾爾當代文學的貢獻。

sentences.english: It introduced the word-cutting method and technique of the Uyghur writing style in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了筆式維吾爾文切分方法與技術。

sentences.english: "The Uyghurs will attack any Han they see, " one man said.
sentences.chinese: 維吾爾人會攻擊他們遇到的任何漢人，一個人說。

sentences.english: The Uighurs are a Turkic-speaking Chinese Muslim minority.
sentences.chinese: 維吾爾人是講突厥語的中國回教徒少數民族。

definition: Altai republic in Russian central Asia, capital Gorno-Altaysk
abbr. for 維吾爾族|维吾尔族, Uighur (Uyghur) ethnic group of Xinjiang
Han of the Five dynasties (951-979), one of ten kingdoms during the Five Dynasties, Ten Kingdoms period (907-960)
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
